Pre-Game Insights: Ghana's form has been inconsistent with two wins, one loss, and three draws in their last six games.
Cape Verde has also had a mixed form with one win, two losses, and three draws in their last six matches.
Ghana's key players include Mohammed Kudus, who starred in the World Cup and is expected to lead the team.
Cape Verde's Bubista has managed the team to progress twice in previous AFCONs, giving them confidence.
Thomas Partey is out for Ghana due to injury, while Antoine Semenyo may also miss the match.
